utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're just here to say goodbye, we're off to Ohio.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, right! Your adoption interview!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yep, we're gonna meet the lady who could be carrying our baby.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't believe it. When you guys come back, you're gonna have a baby! That is so weird!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And so incorrect!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She's only a couple of months pregnant. She liked our application but who knows if she's gonna like us.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on, she's gonna love you guys!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhm, thank you, but we're really trying not to get our hopes up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And a lot could still get in our way.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. I mean, this girl could decide against adoption or she could like another couple better..

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are you gonna name the baby?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can develop a condition in which I talk and talk and no one hears a word.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But just think, ok? What if everything goes right? What if this woman does pick you guys?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God. She's gonna pick us!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So we're standing firm on the 'not getting our hopes up'?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know, I know that things could still go wrong but if they don't? If this works out, we're gonna have a baby Chandler, a baby!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, but...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, it's gonna WORK! We're gonna make it work! I'm gonna be a mummy and you're gonna be a daddy! All right, I'll see you suckers. I'm gonna get me... A BABY!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, screw it, I'm gonna be a daddy!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, who's Phoebe with?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm gonna say someone I'm gonna have sex with. Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So... who's your friend?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, that's Sarah. No, no. Don't you get any ideas, ok? No, I'm not setting you up with any more of my friends!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: OW, why, why, why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Because you'll date her once, sleep with her and then forget she exists!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, name one friend of yours that I did that with.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mandy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Mandy, uh? Uh... really hot blonde, big boobs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know why I don't remember her, huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you think I'm someone else?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok, I may not have treated your friends well in the past, but I have grown up a lot, really. Honest, Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, believe it or not, it's true. When Joey and I were together, he was wonderful. He was thoughtful and mature. And for the one week that we went out, he didn't sleep with anybody else!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Growth!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine, I'll give you her number.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok, thank you. And I promise you I will not forget this one. Mandy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: SARAH!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Saraaah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey you guys, I need some fashion advice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How does this look?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it's a little low... pick up a little... a little bit more... a little bit more... There you go! Now throw it away!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: C'mon! This looks good!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, please, trust me. I buy 30 fashion magazines a month. Now, I don't know who's running for president or who that... NATO guy is, but I do know that you have to get as far away as you can from that hat.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damnit! I have this date tomorrow night and I have to look cool!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you know, if you want fashion help, Rachel and I are going shopping tomorrow. You're more than welcome to come with us, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? That would be great. I mean, I have to do something, she kinda teased me about how I dress.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can see why, nice shirt!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're wearing the same shirt.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Stupid Gap on every corner!

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: Please, make yourself comfortable and I will back in a moment with Erica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, thank you. Uh, well this is it. Are you OK?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. Just weird, you know. It's like: "Hi, I'm Chandler. May I have the human growing inside you?"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, we're gonna be great.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're gonna be great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well... obviously!

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: Monica, Chandler. I'd like you to meet Erica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi. It is so, so nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Hi...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you so much for agreeing to see us.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: I'll let you get acquainted.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: So, it's Monica and Chandler. I only know you as file 0W33815-D.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's what our friends call us.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Gosh, you know, you're just such an amazing couple. It's... kind of intimidating.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't know about that.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: You're kidding me? I mean, it's enough that you are a doctor. But on top of it, you're married to a reverend?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't think that's exactly...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let her finish, doctor.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, my friend Sarah had a great time last night.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! So you're gonna call this one back?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are you talking about? Sarah's great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, really? You know what your great friend did? We're out to dinner, ok? We're getting along, having a really nice time. I was thinking she was really cool. And then, out of nowhere...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's it? That's why you won't go out with her again? So, she took some fries, big deal!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, hey, look! It's not about a few fries... it's about what the fries represent.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: ALL FOOD!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I can't believe I set you up with such a MONSTER!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, hey, hey, hey. Look. I take a girl out, she can order whatever she wants! The more, the better! All right? Just don't order a Garden salad and then eat my food! That's a good way to lose some fingers!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank God you're here. Listen to this!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey and my friend were out last night and having dinner and she reaches over and takes a few of his fries...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Oh, no!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? You know about the plate thing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. Joey doesn't share food. I mean, just last week we were having breakfast and he had a couple of grapes on his plate and ...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You wouldn't let her have a grape?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no! Not me! Emma!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: JOEY DOESN’T SHARE FOOD!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I still think that it's a stupid reason not to call someone again. You are calling her! And if you need to, just get an extra plate of fries for the table!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I like that! A sharing buffer! Yeah! I’ll order some extra fries! Maybe a plate of onion rings. Yeah. And a shrimp cocktail. And some buffalo wings. Maybe an individual pizza, uh? And some mozzarella sticks. What were we talking about?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This place is awesome!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know, we should just go, I'm not gonna find anything here! This stuff is ridiculous!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah, this place is great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, come on, I'm not gonna wear any of this! Nothing silver. . Ok? Nothing with hair! And nothing with padlocks on it! .

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, look, I know that some of this stuff is out there, but I mean, come on, look at this, look at this sweater! . I mean, this is just beautiful!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow, this is really soft . Three hundred and fifty dollars?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, down from seven hundred, you are saving like two hundred bucks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Both logic and math are taking a serious hit today.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: : Hey, check this out! It's totally you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Actually this looks like pretty good! Yeah! Boys will be boys?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? They will be!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, that's it, I'm getting out of here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no, no, no! Ross, wait! Come on! You know, there's other stuff. Here's a nice shirt, look at these nice pants...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, actually these might look pretty good on me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, they will! You know what you should do? Just go take a walk, all right? I know your size and I'm... I'm gonna pick up some really good stuff for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! And I know what looks sexy on guys. Please, just wear what I suggest, and she's gonna go nuts for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, you're saying, uh, if I wear these pants I might be getting into hers?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why do men keep talking to me like this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, the fact that I am a doctor, and my wife's a reverend, that's important to you?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Yeah, I read some great applications, but then I thought “who better then a minister to raise a child!”

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Amen.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Plus I thought the baby would be in good hands with a doctor!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, good hands. Healing hands.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Reverend, can I ask? Does the bible say anything about adoption?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It says "Do it!" And behold she did adopt unto them a baby. And it was good.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, wow.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I was wondering you both have such serious jobs. Would you have time to take care of a baby and your flock?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, you know, my flock is good, I mean, yeah, my flock pretty much takes care of themselves at this point. Good flock. Flock, flock, flock.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Being a doctor must take up a lot of time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not for me it doesn't.

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: So, how's everything going in here?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: We're great, I think I may have asked all my questions.

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: Do you have any question for Erica?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, actually. So, you read a file that you liked and you gave the agency the serial number and they contacted us?

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: Yes, our system assures total anonymity. We're very proud of it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You should be. You're really on top of stuff..

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: Well, then if there's nothing else, then the two of us should talk.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Actually, I don't think we have to.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We don't?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Yeah, when I read about you two, I was pretty sure I wanted you, but I just thought we should meet face to face. . I've made my decision. I choose them.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, this is great! This is so great! . Did you hear that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I did.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, thank you. Thank you so much. . You are SO going to Heaven!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We got some really great stuff!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah but I am not sure about some of the bra's I got.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Really? Do you wanna try some of them on for me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! okay. Wait, are we in Joey's imagination?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no! I took one of Ross' bags by

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: oh, well, Ross probably has it, you can get it from him later.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So? What do you think?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think were not wearing the same shirt anymore!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah! Rachel picked it out for me. She told me to trust her and you know what? I'm glad I did! I turned quite a few heads on my way over here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, I really don't think you should be wearing that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I see, somebody is afraid of a little competition with the ladies?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Looks like someone IS the ladies!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're just jealous because you couldn't pull this off. Yeah, now if you'll excuse me I have a date. See? ALL eyes on ME!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We are NOT signing those papers.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's wrong. They made a mistake. They think we're somebody else.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: God works in mysterious ways.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You have gotta stop!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But she liked us.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She likes Doctor Chandler and Reverend Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, if you think about it, I am kind of like a Reverend. I mean, as a chef, I serve God, by feeing the hungry and poor.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Your Veal Chop is $34.95!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: C'mon Chandler, I think we have been given an opportunity. I mean, the mistake has already been made. They are writing up the paper right now.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But we are not the one she chose! How can you feel okay about this?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because... We may not be who she thinks we are but no-one will ever love that baby more than us.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know..

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I mean, who knows how long it's gonna take for someone else to give us a baby? What if, what if no one ever picks us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: oh, honey..

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please.. please, we are so close.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica, I want a baby too, but this woman is giving away her child. She deserves to know who it's going to.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: okay, right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, we'll tell the truth and who knows, maybe she'll like us for us.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Maybe she will. Uh! Why couldn't I have been a Reverend?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're Jewish.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Technicality!

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: A garden salad for the lady

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, that looks great! Good ordering!

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: Seafood platter for the gentleman and extra fries. Enjoy!

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Mmmh, those fries look delicious.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: oh, I didn't know you liked French fries. Help yourself! What's mine is yours.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Oh wow, are those stuffed clams?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uuuh.. yes, they are my stuffed clams.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How about those fries though, huh?

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: They are delicious

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You are beautiful, you know that?

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Oh, that is so sweet..

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh okay..

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: NOW look what you did!!

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: What? what is the matter with you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't like it when people take food off of my plate, okay?

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: But you just said "What's mine is yours"?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: WELL, I DIDN'T MEAN IT!

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Fine, I'm sorry, I didn't think it was that big a deal.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I'm overreacting. Okay, It's just when it comes to food, I have certain rules, okay, I mean There are things you do..and you know, things.. that you don't do .

utterance.speaker: Girl
utterance.content: Wow, this place looks great.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! You are gonna love it! and I'm so glad, we're finally doing this.

utterance.speaker: Girl
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Here So this was fun!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I really am sorry about, you know..before. I just want to make sure you know that I really do like you.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Sure Just not as much as clams.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, stuffed clams.

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: Chocolate Torte for the lady, cheesecake for the gentleman.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, excuse me sir, there seems to be some sort of red crap on my cheesecake.

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: Yes, that's Raspberry coule.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So stupid, ordering cheesecake, trying to

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, all right, I'll just have what she's having instead.

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry sir, that was our last piece.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Mmmm! Mmm!

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Oh, no! This is work. I should call in. Can you excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, sure. No problem.

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: What are you doing? I thought you don't share food.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure I do. Coule?

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: No. If I can't have your clams, you can't have my dessert. This is a two way street.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Sarah
utterance.content: Really! Now this all better be here when I come back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, of course. I can control myself.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Stop staring at me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why, just a tiny little...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm not even sorry.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Adoption Agency guy
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: So, these are the preliminary forms for an open adoption. There's a lot to go over, but I'll explain everything as we go through it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I-Is... Is that a picture?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Yeah. It's a sonogram they took of the baby last week. I thought you might want to see it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look, doctor!

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: I don't understand.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The agency must have made some mistake. My wife is not a reverend and I'm not a doctor.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: That's impossible.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I could perform an operation on you and prove it if you'd like.

utterance.speaker: Agency guy
utterance.content: I'll go check your file. Excuse me.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: So who are you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, our names really are Monica and Chandler. We're from New York.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but the important thing to know about us, is how much we would care for this little baby.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: So you lied to me before?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, we... "bore false witness"... See I could be a reverend.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I can't believe this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But we were hoping that since we told you the truth that you still might consider...

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Giving you my baby? You think I'd give you my child after this?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, you don't have to decide right now, but if you could just look at our file...

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I don't want to look at your file! This is over.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Erica wait!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I've nothing to say to you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You have every reason to be upset. We did lie. But only because we've been waiting and trying to have a baby for so long. Now we don't know how long it's gonna be before we can get another chance again.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Why don't you ask the reverend to pray on it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Erica, please. Just consider us. Ask them to see our file. Our last name's Bing. My wife's a chef and I'm in advertising.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Oh yeah. I actually liked you guys. But it doesn't matter, because what you did was wrong.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But you did like us. And you should. My wife's an incredible woman. She's loving and devoted and caring. And don't tell her I said this but the woman's always right... I love my wife more than anything in this world. And I... It kills me that I can't give her a baby... I really want a kid. And when that day finally comes, I'll learn how to be a good dad. But my wife... she's already there. She's a mother... without a baby... Please?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You still want that baby?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: God bless you Chandler Bing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Turns out this sweater is made for a woman.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, why are you still wearing it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because it's soft... Hey, so how was your date?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh... Not so good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, looks like it's just the two of us tonight, huh old buddy?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, and you know what? We could do a lot worse.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: JOEY DOESN'T SHARE FOOD!
